content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Easy and simple but fun

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: An amazing puzzle that's simple and new.

Brilliant idea!

IMHO it is never useful to have identical validator check
I would change Validator 3 to something else. I know 1 is an edge case but identical checks are just completely useless.

Better to use 2 instead as 1 in the validator check.

Thank You

I agree its bad, especially in reverse mode. But I don't want to have a case where someone has a working code for input 2-9, gets Test 3 failed, but submits anyway and gets 100%. 

I´m kinda ok if someone decides to output "1" and get only 25%.

Oh!!! You're right. My fault! Should have checked it better.

Thx
